title: UCIL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 364 Apprentice Posts
description: The Uranium Corporation of India Limited (UCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 364 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Trade Apprentices. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, ITI, Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical,  Mechanical, Civil Engineering, MBA, LLB, and any degree can apply for the UCIL Notification 2026. Th...
